value.original: Generate Invoices from Orders. Select the orders to generate the invoice for.
Load flat Files into import tables

row.value: Caricamento flat file nelle tabelle d'importazione

value.original: The Import File Loader parses the content of a flat file and loads it into import tables. Comments start with a '[' and end with a ']' and are ignored; example: [Some Heading].

row.value: Il Caricatore del File di Importazione fa parsing del contenuto del flat file e lo carica nelle tabelle di importazione. I commenti iniziano con una '[' e finiscono con una ']' ed essi sono ingnorati; esempio: [Testata].

value.original: Set up a new Client/Tenant of the system
Use the upper portion to create new charges using the general charge accounts. Use the lower portion to create charges based on the natural account.
Select vendor invoices for payment. If you don't see an invoice, make sure that it is not included in a different (nprocessed) Payment Selection.
Match Purchase Orders, Receipts, Vendor Invoices
Make sure that the Receipts and Invoices are processed. If you want to match partial shipment, make sure that "Same Quantity" is not selected.
Export/Import Translation info to/from xml for translation in external tool. Please note that the Language MUST be an enabled and verified System Langage.
Generate Shipments from Orders. Select the orders to generate the shipments for.

row.value: Manutenzione delle Passwords per gli utenti ed i Business Partners

value.original: Merge From Entity to To Entity - Delete From

row.value: Fusione da Entità ad Entità - Cancella da

value.original:
Dangerous - Please are aware of what you are doing! All instances of the From entity (e.g. Customer A) are changed to the To entity (e.g. Customer B). The From entity (e.g. Customer A) is deleted.

There is NO undo nor trace ! Please do a backup first Please be aware that you may be changing history records (e.g. invoices, etc.) !

Side effects: Merging Products are likely to distort product costs; Merging Business Partners may result in incorrect open item balance. Check with support on remedies.

Restrictions: Accounting and Inventory conflicts are not resolved in this version.

row.value: Potenzialmente dannoso! Per Favore essere sicuri di quello che si stà facendo prima di far partire il Form.

value.original: Enter Transactions via a POS Terminal. Automatically, scans or credit card swipes are recongized.

row.value: Inserisce (esplosa) la distinta base in Ordine o Fattura

value.original: Drop the extended Bill of Materials into an Order, Invoice, etc. The documents need to be in a Drafted stage. Make sure that the items included in the BOM are on the price list of the Order, Invoice, etc. as otherwise the price will be zero!

row.value: Esplode la Distinta Base in un Ordine, Fattura, etc. Il documento deve essere in stato Bozza. Siate sicuri che gli articoli della Distinta Base siano nel listino prezzi dell'Ordine, Fattura, etc altrimenti il prezzo sarà zero.

value.original: View and change trees. Maintain the entries in their specific Windows.

row.value: Mostra e cambia alberi. Gestisce gli ingressi nelle loro finestre specifiche

value.original: Edit the graphical layout of workflows

Depending on the Client Automatic Archive Level documents and reports are saved and available for view. In the Report Viewer you can manually archive Documents or Reports. You can only view archives, if you have access to the original document.

row.value: Depending on the Client Automatic Archive Level documents and reports are saved and available for view. In the Report Viewer you can manually archive Documents or Reports. You can only view archives, if you have access to the original document.

value.original: View all Performance Indicators and Goals

row.value: View all Performance Indicators and Goals
